name: Let there be chaos
description:
This is a short 3D tower defense racing game.

This is just a prototype and proof of concept. We just did not have enough time to add more features and polish the existing ones yet :P

Movement: 
  • WASD
  • Mouse
How to play:

You can either play  the windows or linux version.  Of course you can also compile the project yourself :)

  • Place all listed towers from the right side on the map
    • Click and select tower
    • Click on the map to place
  • Press start
  • Drive the car to the finish line while avoiding the mess you created xD
More:

Code and most of the assets are selfmade and are free to use :D  Everything is open source at: https://github.com/wladi0097/LetThereBeChaos

Enjoy the game!
